name: Cruise Lines
tcc:
H for transactions originating at merchant locations aboard the ship,
for example, an apparel store, gift shop, or florist.
X for the purchase prior to embarkation of tickets for cruise ship
accommodations.
description:
Merchants that provide passenger transportation on the open seas
or inland waters for the purpose of vacation or pleasure. Such
merchants typically offer food, entertainment, and cabin
accommodations inclusive in the fare, and operate predefined and
advertised routes.
